ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Join the fast paced Product Quality Engineering team. You will partner closely with the Engineering, Program Management and Operations teams throughout the product life cycle to enable success.

ul.li: • Working knowledge and theory of Quality Methods, Design of Experiments, statistical process control methods
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
• Technical systems knowledge related to electronics and mechanical assembly
• Reliability methods and quality sampling methodologies
• Third party production quality & process management experience
• Data-driven and results-oriented approach to problem solving
• 5+ years of industry experience in manufacturing or development of electronics
• Experience working with high volume international manufacturers and traveling to manufacturing sites

div.p: • Ensure product quality readiness for all phases of the introduction cycle, including driving contract manufacturer preparation for pre-production builds • Own and drive key quality metrics • Provide regular VP level communication of program quality • Generate Product Quality Plan (PQP) • Drive Final Quality Assurance (FQA) development, documentation, optimization & execution during new product development • Drive FQA issues to resolution during new product development with the cross-functional team • Manage quality escalations during mass production bring up • Support and attend new product development builds as required
BS or MS degree in Engineering
